title: As a user I only want to see MJ NODs in the Club Signature widget if I have permission to e-sign MJ NODs
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* When a user is viewing the Club E-Signature widget, either "MJ Notices of Disposition" is not available in the Type filter, or no results are returned when this option is selected, unless the user has permission to esign Major League Notices of Disposition (we are not going to do this on a transaction level). 
* This needs to be a new permission that we create specifically for this purpose. (same as Player Signature permission)
* This new LDAP should be added to the following roles: 
 - ebis-mj-trans-club-admin-role
 - ebis-mj-trans-boc-admin-role

title: As a user I only want to see MJ NODs in the Player Signature widget if I have permission to e-sign MJ NODs
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* When a user is viewing the Player E-Signature widget, either "MJ Notices of Disposition" is not available in the Type filter, or no results are returned when this option is selected, unless the user has permission to esign Major League Notices of Disposition (we are not going to do this on a transaction level). 
* This needs to be a new permission that we create specifically for this purpose. 
* This new LDAP should be added to the following roles: 
 - ebis-mj-trans-club-admin-role
 - ebis-mj-trans-boc-admin-role

title: As a Club user I want to be able to edit the Authorized Signatory on Submitted and higher minor league transactions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* The "Authorized Signatory" field is editable in any state for Club users on the following transactions: 
 - Transfer
 - Release
 - Loan
 - Return
 - Place on 7 Day DL
 - MN Place on 60 Day DL
 - MN Transfer to 60 Day DL
 - MN Transfer of Rehab
 - MN Place on Rehab Assignment
 - MN Return from Rehab
 - MN Reinstate from DL
 - MN Place on Restricted List
 - MN Reinstate from IL
 - MN Place on Suspended List
 - MN Place on TI LIst
 - MN Place on VR List
 - MN Place on Disqualified List
 - MN Offseason Assignment
 - MN Rule 5 Selection

title: As a Club user I want to be able to edit the Authorized SIgnatory on Submitted and higher major league transactions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* The "Authorized Signatory" field is editable in any state for Club users on the following transactions: 
 - Option
 - Transfer of Option
 - MJ/MN Outright
 - Recall
 - Selection to ML Roster
 - Appointment of 26th Man
 - Return of 26th Man
 - 
 - Place on 7 Day Concussion DL
 - Place on 10 Day DL
 - MJ Place on 60 Day DL
 - Transfer to 10 Day DL
 - MJ Transfer to 60 Day DL
 - MJ Transfer of Rehab
 - MJ Place on Rehab Assignment
 - MJ Return from Rehab
 - MJ Reinstate from DL
 - MJ Place on Restricted List
 - MJ Reinstate from IL
 - MJ Place on Suspended List
 - MJ Place on VR List
 - MJ Place on Disqualified List
 - MJ Offseason Assignment
 - MJ Return of Rule 5 Selection
 - Place on Bereavement List
 - Place on Paternity List

title: As a user I want to be able to see Spring Training Stats on a player's profile
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=stats

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the stats tab of the player profile, Spring Training is an option in the "Regular Season" dropdown. 
* Selecting Spring Training will display any of the player's stats earned during Spring Trainings.

title: As a user I want to submit a Rule 5 Selection's Notice of Disposition for e-signature
custom_steps:
Wireframes:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_a_single_c_for_e-sig

E-Sig Flow:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/MN+Notice+of+Disposition

E-Sig Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Transactions+E-Signature+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria:
* There is an "E-Sign" button on MN Rule 5 Selection transactions that are in a submitted or higher state for Club users with permission to edit the transaction.
* Clicking "E-Sign" will open a menu for the user to select "Notice of Disposition".
* The user will be able to complete the e-signature workflow for the MN Rule 5 Selection's NOD as per the standard MN NOD workflow including: 
 - Submitting the form for e-signature
 - Rule check for Authorized Signatory that has a stored signature 
 - Rule check that the form hasn't already been e-signed 
 - Player Signature from both the Player Signature widget and the transaction itself
 - Club Signature Stamping
 - Transaction updates canceling e-signature
 - User cancellation of e-signature

title: As a User, I want to see Comments appearing on the Special Roster Reports
custom_steps:
These comment boxes should reflect what is included in the comment boxes on the UI.

This story covers all the special rosters:
 - Opening Day
 - Post Season Eligibility
 - Reserve List
 - Foreign Opener
 - Division Series
 - Wild Card
 - League Championship Series
 - World Series

title: As a User, I want ebisID added to the Declared Minor League Free Agent Report
custom_steps:
AC:
 1.  ebisID needs to be added to the report's view
 2.  ebisID needs to be added to the report template
 3.  Report logic needs to be updated so player counts use ebisIDs, rather than player names

title: As a user I want to disable the Declared Minor League Free Agency report shortly before the Declare Minor League Free Agents process is run and then enable the report for Clubs after the process is run and verified by BOC
custom_steps:
The report must still be available to BOC during the process
The process runs on the fifth day after the end of the World Series

title: Query #39:  Offset Salary Earned 2004-Present
custom_steps:
Documentation:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/%2339%3A++Offset+Salary+Earned+2004-Present

Views should be named: **RPT_CUSTOM**_name of query

Dev:
1.  Update wiki with the ebis2 View
2.  Provide an updated run of the ebis1 sql

QA:
1.  Compare ebis1 query to ebis2 view output

title: Query #23: Minor League Contracts with Release Clauses
custom_steps:
Documentation:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/%2323%3A++Minor+League+Contracts+with+Release+Clauses+-+2004+-+Present

Views should be named: **RPT_CUSTOM**_name of query

Dev:
1.  Update wiki with the ebis2 View
2.  Provide an updated run of the ebis1 sql

QA:
1.  Compare ebis1 query to ebis2 view output

title: As a user I want players with the Social Media Release checkbox information to be sent to FAMA
custom_steps:
Feed Requirements: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Feed+Requirements+-+FAMA

Acceptance Criteria: 
* An API is set up that sends the information required as specified for players that have the Social Media Release checkbox checked to FAMA. This will be similar to the Highmark batch. 
* EBIS information as well as any social media information available from Baseball data should be compiled and sent. 
* Presumably, we will also need a way to "remove" players from consideration in FAMA's system when they have the checkbox unchecked on their profile. 
* JoAnn and Jose have worked on delivering a one time dump to FAMA in the past so are best to reach out to with technical questions.
* Whatever solution is arrived at - we need to ensure that it is either not run in lower environments, or that if it is run in a lower environment that it is NOT actually sent to FAMA. We would only want production data to reach them. 

*Note that this is entirely new and I am sure there will be outstanding requirements questions that we need to revisit with users*

title: As a user I want to be warned if I try to submit a NOD for e-sig and it has already been e-signed
custom_steps:
Messages #3:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Transactions+E-Signature+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When clicking "E-Sign" from a MJ/MN Outright that has already had the e-signature workflow completed for the Notice of Disposition, display a warning. See Messages #3. 
* If the user ignores and continues, the e-signature process is re-kicked off and the end result will be two e-signed forms attached to the transaction. (or however many times the user has done this)

custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria:
* When a user is viewing the Player E-Signature widget, either "MJ Notices of Disposition" is not available in the Type filter, or no results are returned when this option is selected, unless the user has permission to esign Major League Notices of Disposition (we are not going to do this on a transaction level).

title: As an EBIS system administrator, I would like to be able to view a live progress report of running nightly batches.
custom_steps:
I'm thinking it's something that looks at the BATCHES_OVERNIGHT_STATUS_VIEW sorted by SEQUENCE_NUMBER.   It color codes green anything that's been run (has MAX_END_TS < MAX_START_TS)  between midnight and NOW.   Red for anything that hasn't and has a button next to the first red one (sorted by sequence number) that allows you to continue from this point.

So much like the nightly batch email, but in a "live" version and allowing for a restart from the point of failure.
